archimate:Goal.name: Critical
archimate:Goal.documentation: Availability (per calendar month) 99.99% (4.32 minutes per month) Reliability 1 unplanned outage per year Recovery Time Objective Service RTO: 30 minutes Support Desk 24 x 7 x 365 Incident Priorities Total Failure = Priority 1 (see definitions below) Partial Failure = Priority 2
